medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive exertional dyspnoea, palpitations, and recurrent chest tightness.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began gradually and progressed over time, with almost daily chest discomfort and exertional dyspnoea.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, but no other cardiovascular risk factors or relevant medical history specified.
medical_history.family_history: No personal or family history of hereditary haemorrhagic telangiectasia.
